ghost

Class Ambusher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Chaser
      • ghost.Ambusher

  • public class Ambusher
extends Chaser
    A kind of ghost that inherits the class Chaser.

      • Ambusher

        public Ambusher(int x,
                int y,
                processing.core.PImage ghost,

                int speed)
        Constructs a new Ambusher object. The instance stores the parameters as its own properties.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-axis position
        y - the y-axis position
        ghost - image of ambusher
        frightened - image of frightened ambusher
        speed - the speed of ambusher

    • Method Detail

      • updateTarget

        public void updateTarget(boolean isScatter,
                         Player player,
                         Chaser chaser)
        Description copied from class: Chaser
        Update the target according to different modes.

        Upper left corner (0, 0), Upper right corner (28 * 16, 0), Bottom left (0, 35 * 16), Bottom right (28 * 16, 35 * 16)
        If any reference parameter is null, do nothing.

        Overrides:
        updateTarget in class Chaser
        Parameters:
        isScatter - If it is true, the mode is 'scatter'.If it is false, the mode is 'chase'.
        player - An object of Player.
        chaser - An object of the class Chaser.
